subject: Extended Deadline (Aug. 25, 2014)- Poland, Sept. 22-24, 2014
from: "The Third International Conference on Informatics Engineering and Information Science (ICIEIS2014)" <donotreply@dcmrf.net>
body:
+-----------------------------------------------------------+ | Please accept our apology for multiple posting. THANK YOU | +-----------------------------------------------------------+ Dear Colleague: Please consider submitting your research paper to the following conferences (www.sdiwc.net): ICIEIS2014: The Third International Conference on Informatics Engineering and Information Science ICETC2014: The International Conference on Education Technologies and Computers (IEEE- Poland Section) Both will be held in Lodz University of Technology, Lodz, Poland +-----------------------------------------------------------+ IMPORTANT DATES: Submission Dates: August 25, 2014 Notification of Acceptance: September 05, 2014 Camera Ready Submission: September 12, 2014 Registration September 12, 2014, It is recommended to do it few days before Conference Dates: September 22-24, 2014 ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b +-----------------------------------------------------------+
| Please accept our apology for multiple posting. THANK YOU |
+-----------------------------------------------------------+
Dear Colleague:

Please consider submitting your research paper to the following conferences (www.sdiwc.net):

ICIEIS2014: The Third International Conference on Informatics Engineering and Information Science


ICETC2014: The International Conference on Education Technologies and Computers (IEEE- Poland Section)

Both will be held in Lodz University of Technology, Lodz, Poland

+-----------------------------------------------------------+
IMPORTANT DATES:

Submission Dates: August 25, 2014
Notification of Acceptance: September 05, 2014
Camera Ready Submission: September 12, 2014
Registration September 12, 2014, It is recommended to do it few days before
Conference Dates: September 22-24, 2014


If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b
